text: mrtanagidda obba vyaktiyannu navu jivantagolisi, atanige prakasavannu odagisi, atanu adarondige janara naduve nadeyuvante madiddu, antaha vyaktiyu, sada kattalalliruva mattu adarolaginda hora baralagada vyaktige samananagalu sadhyave? I riti dhikkarigalige avaru maduttiruva ellavannu candaganisalagide
